title: Spain Masters Super 300 final as it happened: PV Sindhu goes down against Gregoria Mariska Tunjung
content:
WS final, [5] Gregoria Mariska Tunjung 21-8, 21-8 PV Sindhu [2]: That will be all for the blog. A good week with some positives for Sindhu, but a question of how she can recover from this. She is not one to usually to fuss over the odd bad result, and mentally strong enough to bounce back. But definitely, there is a need to iron out the situation with her coaching soon for starters. Thanks for tuning in to our coverage.

    Hello and welcome to our live coverage of badmintonâ€™s BWF World Tour. PV Sindhu will be in action in the final at the Spain Masters Super 300 today in Madrid. She is the last Indian standing at the event.Itâ€™s not been the easiest of starts to the season for PV Sindhu, but here she is today, in her first final appearance of the year. And the first final since CWG 2022 last year, that actually saw her take a lengthy break due to a fracture on her ankle. She will be taking on one of the most improved players on tour, in Indonesiaâ€™s Gregoria Mariska Tunjung. The world No 12 has had some big wins in the last few months and she added the name of Carolina Marin to that list on Saturday as she defeated the home favourite in three games with a remarkable turnaround. This is the 8th meeting between Sindhu and former junior world champ Tunjung and while Sindhu has won all 7 matches in the past, this will be anything but straightforward.
